definition: To conceal or hide something or someone, often used to describe the act of keeping something out of sight or making it inaccessible to others. It is commonly used to refer to the action of covering or obscuring an object or information, typically to protect it from being discovered or to maintain secrecy.

examples.german: Er versteckte das Geschenk, um es vor ihr zu verbergen.
examples.english: He hid the gift to keep it hidden from her.
